book.synopsis:
Millions of women drool over soap star Mac Harrison.And scriptwriter Grace Wellington is no different\x97thehottie headlines all her wildest fantasies. She keeps himfirmly in his place there, however, because her days haveno room for such ego-driven men.

But when she and Mac are thrown together on a project,fantasy becomes blissful reality! All of her secret, naughtydesires come to life under his sizzling ministrations. Thisis one affair to remember\x97and to let go of when it
t agree. He wants to move things fromjust sex to true commitment. Worse,he has all the right moves to convinceher real life is much better\x85.
